Catalano.Imaging.Texture.BinaryPattern

Class CenterSymmetricLocalBinaryPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Texture.BinaryPattern.CenterSymmetricLocalBinaryPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBinaryPattern

    public class CenterSymmetricLocalBinaryPattern
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBinaryPattern
    Center symmetric local binary patterns (CS-LBP) is a type of feature used for classification in computer vision.
